post.text: Join me behind the scenes at the 2016 GOP Convention -- as I introduce our next First Lady of the United States of America, Melania Trump! #MakeAmericaSafeAgain

comment.author: Katey
comment.text: Melania Trump appears to have lifted much of Michelle Obama's 2008 convention speech, using it during her own address to Republicans at their own convention in Cleveland. You must be so proud!
